page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
incidents.message: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

incidents.name: [GRA7][PaaS] - console and authentication issue
incidents.message: Our partner has reported that a fix has been implemented and is monitoring the results.

incidents.name: [RBX/GRA/SBG][MX Plan]- Authentification issue
incidents.message: Our technical teams have set up a pre-prod fix, if the results are conclusive, we will continue with the final fix.

incidents.message: The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
